__e: She was pretty. Poor thing. She hadn't done me any harm... but I had no other choice.
Well, how about we start with me telling you that I love you and that I'm here for you no matter what?
How about we start with the fact that I have been wondering for the last ten hours if you're going to acknowledge what happened last night.
Touching only one body at home was starting to make me a little cray-cray.
She started talking about how happy she is to be on her own and how she doesn't want to date anyone for a while.
Now, there was this issue of a lifelong struggle with poverty, which was beginning to cause reflection to myself after I had run into someone from my past a few days earlier.
Hey, what are you doing it's just getting good!
But anyway, late one night, Christmas Eve... it was turning into Christmas morning.
He stoppped just when it was getting good.
She started talking about how happy she is to be on her own and how she doesn't want to date anyone for a while.
But I just want you to know that if we were somewhere and you started acting all crazy, it would be my honor to kill you.
He actually started to feel a little bit better, but I told him it wasn't worth it to risk it.
When the first light comes up on the clouds...
You know, he was just starting to turn things around for himself.
I just... thought, oh great, thanks, when things finally seemed to be slowing down in my life, and now I have to deal with this.
